survey_name: Public EV Charging Station Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners about their experiences with public EV charging stations to identify areas for improvement and better service planning.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge usage frequency.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered at public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify common pain points.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered at public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for faster or more reliable charging options?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 answer is 3 or lower.
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge willingness to pay for better service.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for faster or more reliable charging options?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 answer is 3 or lower.
